title: I. Period of Storing Personal Data
intro: Sygence retains your personal data only for as long as it is necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce agreements or defend against legal claims.
subtitle: We may retain your data for an extended period where:
list: Required by applicable laws or regulations;
Necessary to establish, exercise, or defend legal rights or claims.
footer: Your personal data will be securely stored until the expiration of the relevant statutory retention period or until such legal claims have been fully resolved, whichever is later. Once the data is no longer required for these purposes, it will be securely deleted or anonymized in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
